00038 LadybugStreamWriter::LadybugStreamWriter()
00039 {
00040    m_pfile = NULL;
00041    m_bytesWritten = 0;
00042    m_iSplitFile = 0;
00043    
00044    strcpy( m_pszFilename, "" );
00045    strcpy( m_pszDestPath, "" );
00046    strcpy( m_pszConfigFilePath, "" );
00047 
00048    m_pConfigBuffer = NULL;
00049 
00050    streamHead.ulLadybugStreamVersion = 0x00000001;
00051    streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize = 0;
00052    streamHead.ulNumberOfImages = 0;
00053    streamHead.ulNumberOfKeyIndex = 0;
00054    streamHead.ulIncrement = OFFSET_INCREMENT_CONSTANT;
00055 
00056 }

00058 
00059 LadybugStreamWriter::~LadybugStreamWriter()
00060 {
00061    if ( m_pConfigBuffer != NULL ) 
00062    {
00063       free( m_pConfigBuffer );
00064       m_pConfigBuffer = NULL;
00065    }
00066    close();
00067 }

00070 LadybugError 
00071 LadybugStreamWriter::open( const char* pszPath, LadybugStreamHeadInfo *streamInfo,
00072       const char* pszConfigFilePath )
00073 {
00074    FILE *configSourceFile = NULL;
00075    long  result   = 0;
00076 
00077    close();
00078 
00079    m_bytesWritten = 0;
00080    m_iSplitFile = 0;
00081 
00082    strncpy( m_pszConfigFilePath, pszConfigFilePath, _MAX_PATH );
00083    strncpy( m_pszDestPath, pszPath, _MAX_PATH );
00084 
00085    //
00086    //Initialize the head info
00087    //
00088    streamHead.dataFormat = streamInfo->dataFormat;
00089    streamHead.resolution = streamInfo->resolution;
00090    streamHead.stippledFormat = streamInfo->stippledFormat;
00091 
00092    memset(&streamHead.ulOffsetTable[0], '\0', 
00093       sizeof(unsigned long) * MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMAGE_INDEXES );
00094 
00095    //
00096    // Write the config info to the config buffer
00097    //
00098    configSourceFile = fopen( m_pszConfigFilePath, "rb" );
00099 
00100    if ( configSourceFile == NULL )
00101       return LADYBUG_COULD_NOT_OPEN_FILE;
00102    else
00103    {
00104       //
00105       //Go to the end of the file
00106       //
00107       result = fseek( configSourceFile, 0, SEEK_END );
00108       if ( result ) 
00109          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00110       else
00111       {
00112          //Get the size of the config file and alloc a reading buffer
00113          streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize = ftell ( configSourceFile );
00114          if ( m_pConfigBuffer != NULL ) 
00115             free( m_pConfigBuffer );
00116          m_pConfigBuffer = (char *)malloc( streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize );
00117 
00118          //
00119          // Read config data to the buffer
00120          //
00121          result = fseek( configSourceFile, 0, SEEK_SET );
00122          if ( result ) 
00123             return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00124          else
00125          {
00126             result = fread(m_pConfigBuffer, sizeof(char), 
00127                streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize, configSourceFile );
00128             if( fclose( configSourceFile ) )
00129                return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00130 
00131             if ( (unsigned)result != streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize )
00132                return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00133          }
00134       }
00135 
00136    }
00137 
00138    return openNextSplitFile();
00139 }
00140 
00141 LadybugError 
00142 LadybugStreamWriter::openWithConfigData( const char* pszPath, 
00143                                         LadybugStreamHeadInfo streamInfo,
00144                                         const char* pszConfigData )
00145 {
00146    close();
00147 
00148    m_bytesWritten = 0;
00149    m_iSplitFile = 0;
00150 
00151    strncpy( m_pszDestPath, pszPath, _MAX_PATH );
00152 
00153    //
00154    //Initialize the head info
00155    //
00156    streamHead = streamInfo;
00157 
00158    memset(&streamHead.ulOffsetTable[0], '\0', 
00159       sizeof(unsigned long) * MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMAGE_INDEXES );
00160 
00161    //
00162    // Write the config info to the config buffer
00163    //
00164    if ( m_pConfigBuffer != NULL ) 
00165       free( m_pConfigBuffer );
00166    m_pConfigBuffer = (char *)malloc( streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize );
00167    memcpy(m_pConfigBuffer, pszConfigData, streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize );
00168 
00169    return openNextSplitFile();
00170 }

00172 
00173 LadybugError 
00174 LadybugStreamWriter::close()
00175 {
00176    int result = 0;
00177 
00178    if( m_pfile != NULL )
00179    {
00180 
00181       //
00182       // Write the head for each stream file
00183       //
00184       result = fseek( m_pfile, SIZE_OF_PGR_STREAM_FILE_FLAG, SEEK_SET );
00185       if ( result ) 
00186          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00187       //
00188       // Write the head info 
00189       //
00190       result = fwrite( &streamHead, sizeof( LadybugStreamHeadInfo ), 1, m_pfile );
00191       if ( result != 1 ) 
00192          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00193 
00194       fclose( m_pfile );
00195       m_pfile = NULL;         
00196    }
00197 
00198    return LADYBUG_OK;
00199 }

00201 
00202 LadybugError 
00203 LadybugStreamWriter::writeFrame( const LadybugImage* pimage )
00204 {
00205    unsigned long startWritingPosition = 0;
00206 
00207    if( pimage == NULL )
00208    {
00209       return LADYBUG_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00210    }
00211 
00212    if( m_pfile == NULL )
00213    {
00214       assert( false );
00215       return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00216    }
00217 
00218    startWritingPosition = ftell( m_pfile );
00219    size_t count = fwrite( pimage->pData, pimage->uiDataSizeBytes, 1, m_pfile );
00220    if( count != 1 )
00221    {
00222       assert( false );
00223       return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00224    }
00225    else
00226    {
00227       m_bytesWritten += pimage->uiDataSizeBytes;
00228    }
00229    
00230 
00231    //
00232    // Set the offset of images written
00233    // Only set this value for every MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMAGE_INDEXES of 
00234    // iamges
00235    //
00236    if ( ( streamHead.ulNumberOfImages % OFFSET_INCREMENT_CONSTANT ) == 0 )
00237    {
00238       streamHead.ulOffsetTable[ 
00239          MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMAGE_INDEXES - ++streamHead.ulNumberOfKeyIndex ] = 
00240          (unsigned long)startWritingPosition;
00241    }
00242    //
00243    // Count the number of images written
00244    //
00245    streamHead.ulNumberOfImages++;  
00246    //
00247    // Split files each GiB
00248    //
00249    if( m_bytesWritten >= 
00250          (__int64)( m_iSplitFile + 1 ) * (__int64)( SPLIT_SIZE ) )
00251    {
00252       m_iSplitFile++;
00253       
00254       LadybugError error;
00255       if( ( error = openNextSplitFile() ) != LADYBUG_OK )
00256       {
00257          assert( false );
00258          return error;
00259       }
00260    }
00261 
00262    return LADYBUG_OK;
00263 }
00264

00266 
00267 LadybugError 
00268 LadybugStreamWriter::openNextSplitFile()
00269 {
00270    long  result = 0;
00271 
00272    close();
00273 
00274    //
00275    // Reset the counter for a new stream file
00276    //
00277    streamHead.ulNumberOfImages = 0;
00278    streamHead.ulNumberOfKeyIndex = 0;
00279    memset(&streamHead.ulOffsetTable[0], '\0', 
00280       sizeof(unsigned long) * MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMAGE_INDEXES );
00281 
00282    sprintf( m_pszFilename, "%s-%03d.pgr", m_pszDestPath, m_iSplitFile );
00283    m_pfile = fopen( m_pszFilename, "wb" );
00284    if( m_pfile == NULL )
00285    {
00286       assert( false );
00287       return LADYBUG_COULD_NOT_OPEN_FILE;
00288    }
00289    else
00290    {
00291       //
00292       // Write the head for each stream file
00293       //
00294       result = fwrite( PGR_STREAM_FILE_FLAG, 
00295          SIZE_OF_PGR_STREAM_FILE_FLAG, 1, m_pfile );
00296       if ( result != 1 ) 
00297          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00298       //
00299       // Write the head info 
00300       //
00301       result = fwrite( &streamHead, 
00302          sizeof( LadybugStreamHeadInfo ), 1, m_pfile );
00303       if ( result != 1 ) 
00304          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00305 
00306       //
00307       // Write config data to stream file
00308       //
00309       result = fwrite(m_pConfigBuffer, 
00310          streamHead.ulConfigrationDataSize, 1, m_pfile );
00311       if ( result != 1 ) 
00312          return LADYBUG_FAILED;
00313    }
00314    return LADYBUG_OK;
00315 }

00317  
00318 double 
00319 LadybugStreamWriter::getMBWritten() const
00320 {
00321    return (double)m_bytesWritten / (double)( 1024 * 1024 );
00322 }
